full_text:
The expected returns to farmers over their cost of production are estimated to be highest in the case of Wheat (106%), followed by rapeseed & mustard (93%) & gram and lentil (78%). For barley it is estimated at 65% and for safflower, it is 50%.

हम वो प्रेम पुजारी !

मां भारती के लिए अपना सर्वस्व न्यौछावर करने का जज़्बा रखने वालों की मुस्कान में एक अलग चमक होती है।
पूरे राष्ट्र को देश के हीरो श्री राहुल माथुर जी पर गर्व है।

@HMOIndia @crpfindia #CRPF https://t.co/SqIsKerTga

मैं नीर भरी दुख की बदली!
स्पन्दन में चिर निस्पन्द बसा
क्रन्दन में आहत विश्व हँसा
नयनों में दीपक से जलते,
पलकों में निर्झारिणी मचली!

'आधुनिक मीरा' व छायावादी आंदोलन की प्रमुख हस्ताक्षर कवयित्री,पद्मविभूषित महादेवी वर्मा जी की पुण्यतिथि पर विनम्र श्रद्धांजलि।

I assured @StopTB ED Ms @LucicaDitiu that for India, elimination of #TB remains the topmost priority inspite of the gigantic pressure we are facing in our battle against #COVID__19
Happy to note that we are touching a million tests every day with #fatality rate at a low of 1.76% https://t.co/moZela6xYM

full_text:
I told Ms @LucicaDitiu that as part of our revised strategy to #StopTB aggressively, we need to showcase states where incidence of disease is lower & they can eliminate TB ahead of 2025 & lead by example.
In this mission, I sought a redefined refocused strategy from global bodies https://t.co/j8hiqAnpwY

full_text:
India’s achievements in the #EndTB mission can serve to provide an impetus to the global movement against #TB

As part of a renewed strategy, we have asked some states & UTs to set their TB elimination targets even ahead of 2025. I want proactive global orgns to help these states https://t.co/FBlA0Mt9BP
